SELECT pe.pre_no, pt.prt_name, prr.prt_qty, pri.prs_err_qty, pe.pre_manager, prr.prs_date, ee.emp_name
FROM produce pe JOIN product pt ON pt.prt_code = pe.prt_code JOIN process_run prr ON pe.pre_no = prr.pre_no JOIN process_inf pri ON prr.prs_no = pri.prs_no JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = pe.pre_manager
ORDER BY pe.pre_no DESC

SELECT er.err_code, er.err_name, prer.prs_err_qty FROM error er JOIN process_err prer ON er.err_code = prer.err_code JOIN process_inf pi ON prer.prs_pf_no = pi.prs_pf_no JOIN process_run prr ON pi.prs_no = prr.prs_no JOIN produce pe ON prr.pre_no = pe.pre_no WHERE prr.pre_no = #{preNo}
